page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT/TRADE IN STURTON
page.content: FIGURES TAKEN FROM THE 1981 EMPLOYMENT CENSUS SHOW THAT OF THE PEOPLE RESIDING IN THE AREA 477 WERE ECONOMICALLY ACTIVE,300 OF THESE BEING MALES,90 FEMALES,58 SELF-EMPLOYED AND 29 UNEMPLOYED. THE TYPES OF EMPLOYMENT IN THE AREA ARE:-{CONSTRUCTION, {DISTRIBUTION & TRANSPORT,AGRICULTURE, {LOCAL GOVERNMENT(SCHOOLS,HIGHWAYS {DEPOT).}IT IS NOTABLE THAT LOCAL GOVERNMENT PROVIDES SOME 48% OF JOBS. 29% OF ALL JOBS AVAILABLE ARE FILLED BY LOCAL PEOPLE. TRADES PROVIDING EMPLOYMENT ARE:- { 2 GENERAL STORES TV REPAIRS { AGRICULTURAL REPAIRS WAREHOUSING { CARAVAN CENTRE HAIRDRESSER { POST OFFICE PET SUPPLIES { 2 BUTCHERS FARM SHOP { 2 PUBLIC HOUSES JOINERY { CAR REPAIRS FARMHOUSE B&B { HORSE SANCTUARY GARAGE
